author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed calculation of x and y radius for gaussian blur.
2) Refactored blur code so it can be used for non-circular blurs (also
3) ConcreateGaussianBlurRable now properly grows it's input bounds by
4) Removed unneeded Pad Op in AbstractGraphicsNode (comments?)
5) ConcreateFilterRegion now uses nodes getBounds not primitive bounds
This ensures the filter extent is considered.
